resources.string: We Deliver fast food or pick up the food from the restaurant of you choice. Restaurants included are McDonalds, Wendys , Burgerking , Nandos and more. Delivery available based upon requested store hours.
$12 minimum charge for one stop shop, $20 for two stop shops. \nTime - give us 40 minutes to deliver it to you.
Medication , smokes - Laundry Pickup and drop off, other small Item delivery and pick up.
